channel.title: blog on Satya Pavan's Serverless Soul
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Satya Pavan's Serverless Soul

item.title: Productivity Hacks
item.description: Contrasting Personal and Professional roles If you’re productive in one way at work, take the opposite approach in your personal life.

item.title: Let's begin with a mistake
item.description: Tuco: When you have to shoot, shoot. Don’t talk. He would have said the same of this blog too.

item.title: Fork bomb
item.description: A fork bomb works by creating a large number of processes very quickly in order to saturate the available space in the list of processes kept by the computer’s operating system.
